alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 5:17PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Bayfield and northeastern Douglas Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 517 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Poplar, or 18 miles southeast of Superior, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Spotters report pea-size hail in Poplar at 516 PM with this storm. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Maple around 520 PM CDT. Lake Nebagamon around 525 PM CDT. Brule around 530 PM CDT. Oulu around 535 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Iron River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
